translations: vi.拖延，拖拉；徘徊；停留（tarry 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Long tarrying takes all thanks away.
sentences.translation: 事情耽搁太久就没有人会感谢了。

sentences.sentence: Long tarrying takes all the thanks away.
sentences.translation: 事情耽搁太久就没有人会感谢了。

sentences.sentence: My heart has been tarrying at this small town.
